content: **from the website ** > *as pretty as a rainbow our rainbow waves afghan will add light and color > to any room single_crochet stitches > are worked into the row below the > working row creating a wonderfully > textured v pattern follow our color > combination or make up your own * afghan is worked across long edge **yarn requirements ** 7 oz each * medium blue * light blue * lilac * light lilac * rose * light rose * peach * light peach * yellow * light aqua * aqua
